name: Runner 2049
description: This pseudo-isometric infinite runner, set in the near future in the streets of New York, was created as a LudumDare 46 submission. The game has a striking visual style and gameplay consisting of three main features: jumping, shooting enemy drones and recharging the android-main-character’s battery by synchronizing pulses of electric current. The project is in the early stage of development and we have much to lookforward to: procedural surroundings generation, improving on visuals and gameplay, adding more gameplay features and expanding the world.
